sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>woman</radical> who makes your <radical>house</radical> a home is your <kanji>bride</kanji>.
meaningInfo: She's in your house because you married her. Thus, she's your bride. Your house is now a home.
readingMnemonic: Now that you have a <kanji>bride</kanji> in your house, you can get rid of <reading>yo</reading>ur <reading>mai</reading>d (<ja>よめ</ja>), since your bride will do all the cleaning.
readingInfo: Your bride is very upset at how sexist you're being right now, and makes you do all the cleaning instead. The maid still gets fired.
